name: Pizza Hunt
description:
Play as a pizza trying to escape the pizzaria in this infinite score arcade style game! Get power-ups, throw pizza slices at zombie pizzas and sodas, and catch your slices to recover life! But be careful, your life and ammo are joined together! 

Instructions:

W/A/S/D - Move

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Space - Use ultimate attack

Power-Ups:

Flour sack - Your attacks doesn't consume life for a few seconds

Tomato sauce - Increase your speed up for a few seconds

Pepperoni slices - Get 3 of them to unleash your ultimate attack

Pizza Box - Gain a shield for a few seconds
